segments.text: I would like to make an offer on this house , but I don ’ t know much about the process .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As your realtor , I am here to take care of this process . How much were you planning on offering ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really like the house and will pay the full asking price of three hundred and fifty thousand dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We want to leave ourselves some bargaining room . Let ’ s offer three hundred and twenty thousand dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds good , but I don ’ t want this house to get away from me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The market is fairly down right now , so the offer is a realistic one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When will we know if they accept the offer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The owners usually respond to an offer within a few days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Should I be contacting my bank in the meantime ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are already pre-qualified for your loan , so you are in good shape .
segments.speaker: S2
